text.name: Book of Dead
text.description: Allows hero to cast Death Ripple and Animate Dead at expert level.
text.event: In the shadowy depths of a forgotten tomb, you uncover the Book of the Dead with cover etched with cryptic runes and bound in ancient, decayed leather. As you open the book, a chill sweeps through the air, and ghostly whispers fill your ears, revealing forbidden necromantic knowledge.
